verbose_text: The results showed that p-EGFR was significantly down-regulated by combining 50 muM quinalizarin and 50 muM icotinib compared with quinalizarin alone (P < 0.05 in H1650 and P < 0.01 in H1975) and icotinib alone (both P < 0.001).
evidence: p-EGFR was significantly down-regulated by combining 50 muM quinalizarin
